title: 50. What Happens When a Hospital Closes?
description: When a hospital closes in a rural area, it’s a big deal. But are all patients affected equally? We look at new research on the unexpected outcomes of traveling farther for care.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: When a hospital closes in a rural area, it’s a big deal. But are all patients affected equally? We look at new research on the unexpected outcomes of traveling farther for care.
